titles.title: To modify the project for beach erosion control, Tybee Island, Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 7/18/2001--Introduced. Modifies the project for beach erosion control at Tybee Island, Georgia, to include the northern end of Tybee Island, extending from the north terminal groin to the mouth of Lazaretto Creek, as a part of the project.
